introduction: Swedish TV-series in six parts about the video room of Ingmar Bergman. Every part has a theme (humor, death, fear, etc...) and a guest visiting Bergmans home in Fårö, Gotland, Sweden. There are also interviews and film clips from other directors and actors.Part 1 - Theme: HumourGuest at Bergmans house: Tomas Alfredson.Interviews and such with: Robert de Niro, Wes Anderson, Alexander Payne & Agnès JaouiPart 2 - Theme: DeathGuest at Bergmans house: Alejandro González IñárrituInterviews and such with: Woody Allen, Gus van Sant & Agnieszka Holland.Part 3 - Theme: AdventureGuest at Bergmans house: Daniel EspinosaInterviews and such with: Zhang Yimou, Laura Dern & Francis Ford CoppolaPart 4 - Theme: SilenceGuest at Bergmans house: Claire DenisInterviews and such with: Ang Lee, Holly Hunter & Lars von Trier (the interview with von Trier is totally awesome... haha...)Part 5 - Theme: FearGuest at Bergmans house: Michael HanekeInterviews and such with: Wes Craven, Ridley Scott, Mieko HaradaPart 6 - Theme: AlienationGuest at Bergmans house: John LandisInterviews and such with: Martin Scorsese, Isabella Rossellini, Jean-Pierre Dardenne & Luc Dardenne
